text: Carmelo Garrido Alarcón (born September 12, 1971 in Puertollano, Ciudad Real) is a 5-per-team football player from Spain. He has a disability: he is blind. He played 5-per-team football at the 2004 Summer Paralympics. His team finished third after they played Greece and, won 2-0. == References == Category:Spanish footballers Category:Living people Category:1971 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:Castile-La Mancha Category:Spanish 5-per-team footballers
title: Carmelo Garrido Alarcón
